data.description:
SolarBlack is an action-rhythm game made exclusively for VR where you slice and shoot to the beat to defeat an other-worldly threat. Immerse yourself in new worlds as you train your body and mind in time to a handcrafted soundtrack. Control the tempo of the battle as you see fit with Flextime and seek to unravel the secrets of the universe on your journey to becoming the ultimate legend of sound and space.

This is the first VR game that weaves two awesome fighting styles together in a single pulse-pounding, unstoppable rhythmic action. Featuring 13 soundtracks specially composed to accompany incredible graphics and atmospheric worlds that pulses to the beat. With 5 different difficulties to challenge yourself, there is something for every legend or legend-in-training. You get to choose where you want to play out your personal action-movie scene fantasy with over 26 environments, some of which might look familiar to you!

The combination of shooting enemies, slicing targets, and evading lasers still not challenging enough for you? Try hunting for all of the collectibles on top of shooting enemies, slicing targets, and evading lasers... If everything gets too overwhelming, remember, you still have your slow motion superpower: Flextime.

Just like the universe, our song list is expanding slowly but surely with 2 new tracks. Pump up the beat with 'Fresh!' by Schwank to fire up your fitness routine or rock out to Rohrenreit12’s ‘Think’ if your workout is lacking a bit of rock n' roll.
